alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Lincoln; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:29PM EDT until May 19 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Garrard County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Madison County in central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Indian Lakes Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln, southeastern Garrard and southwestern Madison Counties, including the following locations... Round Hill, Crab Orchard, Bighill, Ottenheim, Broughtentown, Buggytown, Cartersville, Hackley, Maywood and Berea. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
